name: Sync
description: RebasedSync. Helper functions for syncing the Oracle and notifying pools of balance changes.

eventDecorators.name: OracleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event `voter` the address that will cast votes weighted by the number of tokens staked for `voter` `staker` the address staking for `voter` - tokens are transferred from & returned to `staker` `proxy` is the Staking Proxy contract that is approved by `staker` to perform the token transfer `amount` is the value of tokens to be staked*.
